page.title: 20E.of OFFCHURCH - CONCLUSION.
page.content: No town or large village! No shops, churches, schools - how uninteresting? We thought so at first. But then we went exploring and found an area rich in history - the Roman{Fosse Way,}the {Welsh Drovers' Road,}the little green lane called the{Ridgeway,}a page from the past. We found varied{habitats}for an abundance of{wildlife. We saw modern farming methods and discovered a{Cellular radio mast. We talked to people enjoying themselves picking fruit and to local residents of{Offchurch}and nearby who made us welcome in their homes. Yes! We've enjoyed surveying such an interesting part of England.{ { { SURVEY CONDUCTED BY - { OUR LADY AND ST TERESA'S RC SCHOOL {CUBBINGTON, LEAMINGTON SPA. WARKS.
